field.name: geo
field.documentation: Geometry data for implicit objects

field.name: geotype
field.documentation: Type of geometry (id flag). A flag defining how the geometry data associated with grid objects is to be interpreted. If the field is undefined (0=GRID_UNDEFINED), the standard interpretation for; the given coordinate types is assumed.

field.name: geotypeid
field.documentation: Type of geometry (id string).

field.name: coordtype
field.documentation: Type of coordinates describing the physical space. Vector (number of space dimensions); The size of coordtype defines the dimension of the space.; For predefined integer constants for standard coordinates see; the documentation of the grid service library.

field.name: geo_matrix
field.documentation: Geometry data matrix associated with implicit objects. Array of structures (number of subgrids this information is stored on); The exact definition of the stored values depends on the geometry type of the geometry complexgrid_geo_global.geotype;

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this scalar quantity is associated with.

field.name: subgrid
field.documentation: Index of the subgrid (as stored in grid.subgrids) the data is stored on.

field.name: scalar
field.documentation: Scalar representation of data. One scalar entry is stored per object in the subgrid.; The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float Vector(nobjects_subgrid). First dimension: object index.

field.name: vector
field.documentation: Vector representation of data. One vector is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float matrix(nobjects_subgrid, ndata).First dimension: object index, second dimension: index of data vector.

field.name: matrix
field.documentation: Matrix representation of data. One matrix is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; 3d float array(nobjects_subgrid,ndata1,ndata2). First dimension: object index, second dimension: matrix row, third dimension: matrix column.

field.name: measure
field.documentation: Measure of object, i.e. physical size (length for 1d, area for 2d, volume for 3d objects) in this geometry. [m^dim].; Use this field to store measures of implicitly defined grid objects.; Array of structures (number of subgrids this information is stored on)

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this scalar quantity is associated with.

field.name: subgrid
field.documentation: Index of the subgrid (as stored in grid.subgrids) the data is stored on.

field.name: scalar
field.documentation: Scalar representation of data. One scalar entry is stored per object in the subgrid.; The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float Vector(nobjects_subgrid). First dimension: object index.

field.name: vector
field.documentation: Vector representation of data. One vector is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float matrix(nobjects_subgrid, ndata).First dimension: object index, second dimension: index of data vector.

field.name: matrix
field.documentation: Matrix representation of data. One matrix is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; 3d float array(nobjects_subgrid,ndata1,ndata2). First dimension: object index, second dimension: matrix row, third dimension: matrix column.

field.name: bases
field.documentation: Vector bases. Used for aligned vector representation. Time-dependent; Array of structures (number of bases)

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this vector quantity is associated with.

field.name: label
field.documentation: Label describing the data

field.name: comp
field.documentation: Components of the vector. Array of structures (number of vector components). Time-dependent; FIXME: inherit time-dependence for this element

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this scalar quantity is associated with.

field.name: subgrid
field.documentation: Index of the subgrid (as stored in grid.subgrids) the data is stored on.

field.name: scalar
field.documentation: Scalar representation of data. One scalar entry is stored per object in the subgrid.; The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float Vector(nobjects_subgrid). First dimension: object index.

field.name: vector
field.documentation: Vector representation of data. One vector is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float matrix(nobjects_subgrid, ndata).First dimension: object index, second dimension: index of data vector.

field.name: matrix
field.documentation: Matrix representation of data. One matrix is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; 3d float array(nobjects_subgrid,ndata1,ndata2). First dimension: object index, second dimension: matrix row, third dimension: matrix column.

field.name: align
field.documentation: Alignment flag for vector components. Integer vector (number of vector components).

field.name: alignid
field.documentation: Alignment id for vector components. String vector (number of vector components).

field.name: basis
field.documentation: Index of basis (defined in associated grid) this vector is aligned to; If set to GRID_UNDEFINED=0, the canonical basis of the default coordinates of the grid assumed.

field.name: value
field.documentation: The source-rate of particles in phase space, given on GRID. The units depend on the grid_type: [m^-3 s^-1] if the grid is discrete in energy/velocity and [(m/s)^-3 m^-3 s^-1] if the grid is continuous. Time-dependent; Complexgrid_scalar

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this scalar quantity is associated with.

field.name: subgrid
field.documentation: Index of the subgrid (as stored in grid.subgrids) the data is stored on.

field.name: scalar
field.documentation: Scalar representation of data. One scalar entry is stored per object in the subgrid.; The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float Vector(nobjects_subgrid). First dimension: object index.

field.name: vector
field.documentation: Vector representation of data. One vector is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float matrix(nobjects_subgrid, ndata).First dimension: object index, second dimension: index of data vector.

field.name: matrix
field.documentation: Matrix representation of data. One matrix is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; 3d float array(nobjects_subgrid,ndata1,ndata2). First dimension: object index, second dimension: matrix row, third dimension: matrix column.

field.name: source_grid
field.documentation: TO BE REMOVED, being replaced by source_rate. Kept only to make smooth transition between data-type versions. [Source density of particles in phase space (real space, velocity space, spin state); simplified formulation, without the grid-cpo.]

field.name: grid_info
field.documentation: Specifying the grid; type of the grid (unstructured/structured/rectangular), the grid coordiante, in what variables the source is continuous/discrete, if the source is given at gyrocentre or real particle position.

field.name: grid_type
field.documentation: Type of grid in continuous dimensions: 1=unstructured grid, 2=structured non-rectangular grid, 3=rectangular. For rectangular grids, and/or dimensions with discrete source, the grid coordinates dim1,dim2,... is stored in vectors dim1(1:ndim1,1,1,1), dim1(1,1:ndim2,1,1),...

field.name: ngriddim
field.documentation: Number of grid dimension. For ngriddim=2 the grid is specified by dim1 and dim2 only, while dim3, dim4, dim5, and dim6 can be ignored (should not be allocated). For ngriddim=3 also dim3 is used to describe the grid etc. E.g. if your distribution is given by the three variables the poloidal flux, perpendicular and parallel velocities, then ngriddim=3 and grid_coord(1)=15, grid_coord(1)=16, grid_coord(3)=6.

field.name: grid_coord
field.documentation: Identifies the coordinates specifies in dim1, dim2, dim3, dim4, dim5, and dim6. grid_coord(K) describe the coordinate represented in dimK, for K=1,2...6. The possible coordinates are: 1=R, Major radius [m]; 2=Z, Vertical position [m]; 3=X, first cartesian coordinate in the horizontal plane [m]; 4=Y, second cartesian coordinate in the horizontal plane (grad(X) x grad(Y) = grad(Z)) [m]; 5=phi, toroidal angle [rad]; 6=psi, poloidal magnetic flux [T*m^2]; 7=rhotor, the square root of the toroidal flux; 8=theta, geometrical poloidal angle [rad]; 9=theta_b, Boozer poloidal angle [rad]; 10=vx, velocity in the x-direction [m/s]; 11=vy, velocity in the y-direction [m/s]; 12=vz, velocity in the z-direction [m/s]; 13=vel, total velocity [m/s]; 14=vphi, velocity in the phi-direction [m/s]; 15=vpar, velocity in the parallel direction [m/s]; 16=vperp, velocity in the perpendicular direction [m/s]; 17=E, Hamiltonian energy [J]; 18=Pphi, canonical toroidal angular momentum [kg m^2/s]; 19=mu, magnetic moment [J/T]; 20=Lambda=mu/E [1/T]; 21=pitch=vpar/v [-]; 22=s, the position of the omnigenous plane (generalised equitorial plane) as described by the fields omnigen_surf%s and omnigen_surf%rz; 23=particle spin; 24=n_Legendre, the index of the Legendre polynomial of the pitch, e.g. if the k:th component of dim3(1,1,k,1,1,1)=5 then this refer to the 5:th Legendre polynomial P_5(xi). Vector (6)

field.name: discrete_dims
field.documentation: Specifies discrete or continuous grid in each dimension separately. For discrete_dims(K)=1, K=1,2...6: the source is discretely distributed at the grid points of the dimK-grid (e.g. to treat the discrete energies injected with NBI); for discrete_dims(K)=0: continuous source, i.e. the source is distributed over the continuous variable dimK (e.g. the source density is a continuous function of the major radius). Vector (6)

field.name: dim1
field.unit: Source density of particles in phase space (real space, velocity space, spin state); simplified formulation, without the grid-cpo..
field.documentation: Grid in the first dimension in phase space (as specified in grid_coord). Time-dependent; Array6d (ndim1, ndim2, ndim3, ndim4, ndim5, ndim6)

field.name: dim2
field.unit: Source density of particles in phase space (real space, velocity space, spin state); simplified formulation, without the grid-cpo..
field.documentation: Grid in the second dimension in phase space (as specified in grid_coord). Time-dependent; Array6d (ndim1, ndim2, ndim3, ndim4, ndim5, ndim6)

field.name: dim3
field.unit: Source density of particles in phase space (real space, velocity space, spin state); simplified formulation, without the grid-cpo..
field.documentation: Grid in the third dimension in phase space (as specified in grid_coord). Time-dependent; Array6d (ndim1, ndim2, ndim3, ndim4, ndim5, ndim6)

field.name: dim4
field.unit: Source density of particles in phase space (real space, velocity space, spin state); simplified formulation, without the grid-cpo..
field.documentation: Grid in the fourth dimension in phase space (as specified in grid_coord). Time-dependent; Array6d (ndim1, ndim2, ndim3, ndim4, ndim5, ndim6)

field.name: dim5
field.unit: Source density of particles in phase space (real space, velocity space, spin state); simplified formulation, without the grid-cpo..
field.documentation: Grid in the fifth dimension in phase space (as specified in grid_coord). Time-dependent; Array6d (ndim1, ndim2, ndim3, ndim4, ndim5, ndim6)

field.name: dim6
field.unit: Source density of particles in phase space (real space, velocity space, spin state); simplified formulation, without the grid-cpo..
field.documentation: Grid in the sixth dimension in phase space (as specified in grid_coord). Time-dependent; Array6d (ndim1, ndim2, ndim3, ndim4, ndim5, ndim6)

field.name: jacobian
field.unit: Source density of particles in phase space (real space, velocity space, spin state); simplified formulation, without the grid-cpo..
field.documentation: Jacobian of the phase space grid coordinate system specified in grid_coord. Time-dependent; Array6d (ndim1, ndim2, ndim3, ndim4, ndim5, ndim6)

field.name: source
field.documentation: Source rate of particles in phase space. The units depend on the grid_type: [m^-3 s^-1] if the grid is discrete in energy/velocity and [(m/s)^-3 m^-3 s^-1] if continuous. Time-dependent; Array6d (ndim1, ndim2, ndim3, ndim4, ndim5, ndim6)

field.name: markers
field.documentation: Source given as a set of markers (test particles) born per second.

field.name: variable_ids
field.documentation: Integer identification of the variables stored in the coord matrix. Vector(NDIM)

field.name: id
field.documentation: Short string identifier

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Integer identifier

field.name: description
field.documentation: Verbose description of identifier

field.name: coord
field.documentation: Coordinates of the markers. The coordinates used is specified in variable_ids. Time-dependent; Float(NMARK,NDIM)

field.name: weight
field.documentation: Weight of the marker; number of real particles represented by the marker. Time-dependent; Float(NMARK)

field.name: codeparam
field.documentation: Code parameters

field.name: codename
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: codeversion
field.documentation: Version of the code (as in the ITM repository)

field.name: parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_diag
field.documentation: List of the code specific diagnostic/output, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values meaning some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used. Exact rules could discussed and implemented in the module wrapper. Time-dependent.

field.name: codeparam
field.documentation: Code parameters

field.name: codename
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: codeversion
field.documentation: Version of the code (as in the ITM repository)

field.name: parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_diag
field.documentation: List of the code specific diagnostic/output, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values meaning some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used. Exact rules could discussed and implemented in the module wrapper. Time-dependent.

field.name: time
field.documentation: Time [s]; Time-dependent; scalar

CPO.documentation: Electron Cyclotron Emission Diagnostic; Time-dependent CPO

field.name: datainfo
field.documentation: Generic information on a data item

field.name: dataprovider
field.documentation: Name of the actual data provider (the person who filled the data)

field.name: putdate
field.documentation: Date at which the data has been put in the DB

field.name: source
field.documentation: Exact reference of the data source (e.g. original reference in the native machine data base)

field.name: comment
field.documentation: Any additional comment

field.name: cocos
field.documentation: COordinates COnventionS followed by this CPO

field.name: id
field.documentation: CPO id for checking its provenance in the workflow

field.name: isref
field.documentation: 1 if the data can be found in the present data base entry; 2 if the data can be found in a parent data base entry; 0 if no data consistent with the present entry can be found.

field.name: whatref
field.documentation: Structure defining a database entry and the CPO occurrence

field.name: user
field.documentation: Name of the user if private data, public if public ITM database.

field.name: machine
field.documentation: Name of the device

field.name: shot
field.documentation: Shot number

field.name: run
field.documentation: Run number

field.name: occurrence
field.documentation: Occurrence number of the CPO in the reference entry

field.name: putinfo
field.documentation: Level 2 information describing how to retrieve the actual data for the UAL. Not to be filled/used by the ITM user !

field.name: putmethod
field.documentation: Storage method for this data

field.name: putaccess
field.documentation: Instructions to access the data using this method

field.name: putlocation
field.documentation: Name of this data under this method

field.name: rights
field.documentation: Access rights to this data

field.name: setup
field.documentation: diagnostic setup information

field.name: frequency
field.documentation: Frequency of the ECE channels. Vector (nchannels)

field.name: los
field.documentation: Geometry of the line of sight.

field.name: pivot_point
field.documentation: Pivot point of each line of sight; Vector (nchords)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: horchordang1
field.documentation: Angle [rad] of horizontal projection of l.o.s. with poloidal cross section (0 for HFS to LFS chord - see Convention_angles_interfdiag.pdf) [rad]. Vector (nchords)

field.name: verchordang1
field.documentation: Angle of chord with vertical axis (0 for bottom-top chord, Pi for top-bottom chord - see Convention_angles_interfdiag.pdf) [rad]; Vector (nchords)

field.name: width
field.documentation: Width of the laser beam (1/e) [m]; Vector (nchords)

field.name: second_point
field.documentation: Second point defining the line of sight together with the pivot_point. In case the probing wave is reflected, this should be the position of the mirror. This data is redundant with horchordang1 and verchordang1. Vector (nchords).

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: horchordang2
field.documentation: For reflected l.o.s. only (undefined otherwise) : Angle [rad] of horizontal projection of reflected l.o.s. with poloidal cross section (0 for HFS to LFS chord - see Convention_angles_interfdiag.pdf) [rad]. Vector (nchords)

field.name: verchordang2
field.documentation: For reflected l.o.s. only (undefined otherwise) : Angle of reflected chord with vertical axis (0 for bottom-top chord, Pi for top-bottom chord - see Convention_angles_interfdiag.pdf) [rad]; Vector (nchords)

field.name: third_point
field.documentation: Third point defining the reflected line of sight together with the second_point (undefined if the probing wave is not reflected). This data is redundant with horchordang2 and verchordang2. Vector (nchords).

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: nchordpoints
field.documentation: Number of points along the viewing chords (used for synthetic diagnostic signal reconstruction)

field.name: measure
field.documentation: Measured values

field.name: harmonic
field.documentation: Harmonic detected by the ECE channels. Time-dependent.

field.name: position
field.documentation: Position of the measurement. Time-dependent. Vector (nchannels)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Vector

field.documentation: Absolute error on signal; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: relerror
field.documentation: Relative error on signal (normalised to signal value); Time-dependent; Vector

field.documentation: Storage method for this data

field.documentation: Instructions to access the data using this method

field.documentation: Name of this data under this method

field.name: rights
field.documentation: Access rights to this data

field.name: grid
field.documentation: Grid description

field.name: uid
field.documentation: Unique index of this grid. Used for handling multiple grids

field.name: id
field.documentation: Name / identifier string for this grid

field.name: spaces
field.documentation: Definitions of grid spaces. Array of structures (number of spaces)

field.name: geotype
field.documentation: Type of space geometry (id flags). Flags defining how the geometry (objects.geo) fields associated with; space objects are to be interpreted. Array (number of geometries defined for this space),; first dimension: geometry index. A flag value of GRID_UNDEFINED=0 indicates the standard interpretation for; the given coordinates.

field.name: geotypeid
field.documentation: Type of space geometries (id string). See geotype.

field.name: coordtype
field.documentation: Type of coordinates describing the physical space. Vector (number of space dimensions); The size of coordtype defines the dimension of the space.; For predefined integer constants for standard coordinates see; the documentation of the grid service library.

field.name: objects
field.documentation: Definition of the space objects.; Array of structures (dimension of highest-dimensional objects).; First dimension: dimension of the objects (1=nodes, 2=edges, 3=faces, 4=cells/volumes, ...)

field.name: boundary
field.documentation: Lists of (n-1)-dimensional space objects defining the boundary of an n-dimensional space object.; Matrix(number of objects of dimension n, maximum number of boundary objects).; First dimension: object index, second dimension: boundary object index

field.name: neighbour
field.documentation: Connectivity information. Array (number of objects, maximum number of boundaries per object, maximum number of neighbours per boundary).; Stores the indices of the n-dimensional objects adjacent to the given n-dimensional object.;An object can possibly have multiple neighbours on every boundary.; First dimension: object index, second dimension: boundary index, third dimension: neighbour index on the boundary.

field.name: geo
field.documentation: Geometry data matrix associated with every object. Float array (number of objects, number of geometry coeff. 1, number of geometry coeff. 2, number of geometries).; The exact definition depends on the geometry type of the space (complexgrid_space.geotype).; First dimension: object index, second+third dimension: geometry coefficient matrix row+column, third dimension: geometry index (for definition of multiple geometries).

field.name: measure
field.documentation: Measure of space objects, i.e. physical size (length for 1d, area for 2d, volume for 3d objects,...). [m^dim].; First dimension: object index, second dimension: geometry index

field.name: xpoints
field.documentation: List of indices of all nodes which are x-points. Vector (number of x-points)

field.name: subgrids
field.documentation: Definitions of subgrids. Array of structures (number of subgrids)

field.name: id
field.documentation: ID string (name) of the subgrid.

field.name: list
field.documentation: List of object lists. Array of structures (number of object lists).

field.name: cls
field.documentation: Class tuple of the grid objects in this object list. Vector (number of grid spaces)

field.name: indset
field.documentation: Implicit list of the object indices.; Array of structures (number of grid spaces = length of index tuple). Every index of the index tuple is described by an index set, which defines either a list of index values or a range of index values.

field.name: range
field.documentation: Defines an index range enumerating from range[1] to range[2] (with both range[1] and range[2] included). If additionally a third value range(3) is given, it is used as a stride. If it is omitted, a stride of 1 is assumed. Vector(3)

field.name: ind
field.documentation: An explicit list of indices. If this member is defined and has nonzero size, the list is assumed to be explicit. Vector(length of explicit index list)

field.name: ind
field.documentation: Explicit list of index tuples. Matrix (number of objects, number of spaces in grid).; First dimension: object index, second dimension: index tuple/space index.; If this field is defined and has nonzero size, the object list is understood to be explicit.

field.name: metric
field.documentation: Metric coefficients

field.name: measure
field.documentation: Measure of object, i.e. physical size (length for 1d, area for 2d, volume for 3d objects). [m^dim].; Use this field to store measures of implicitly defined grid objects.; Array of structures (number of subgrids this information is stored on)

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this scalar quantity is associated with.

field.name: subgrid
field.documentation: Index of the subgrid (as stored in grid.subgrids) the data is stored on.

field.name: scalar
field.documentation: Scalar representation of data. One scalar entry is stored per object in the subgrid.; The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float Vector(nobjects_subgrid). First dimension: object index.

field.name: vector
field.documentation: Vector representation of data. One vector is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float matrix(nobjects_subgrid, ndata).First dimension: object index, second dimension: index of data vector.

field.name: matrix
field.documentation: Matrix representation of data. One matrix is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; 3d float array(nobjects_subgrid,ndata1,ndata2). First dimension: object index, second dimension: matrix row, third dimension: matrix column.

field.name: g11
field.documentation: Metric coefficients g11. Array of structures (number of subgrids this information is stored on)

field.name: geo
field.documentation: Geometry data for implicit objects

field.name: geotype
field.documentation: Type of geometry (id flag). A flag defining how the geometry data associated with grid objects is to be interpreted. If the field is undefined (0=GRID_UNDEFINED), the standard interpretation for; the given coordinate types is assumed.

field.name: geotypeid
field.documentation: Type of geometry (id string).

field.name: coordtype
field.documentation: Type of coordinates describing the physical space. Vector (number of space dimensions); The size of coordtype defines the dimension of the space.; For predefined integer constants for standard coordinates see; the documentation of the grid service library.

field.name: geo_matrix
field.documentation: Geometry data matrix associated with implicit objects. Array of structures (number of subgrids this information is stored on); The exact definition of the stored values depends on the geometry type of the geometry complexgrid_geo_global.geotype;

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this scalar quantity is associated with.

field.name: subgrid
field.documentation: Index of the subgrid (as stored in grid.subgrids) the data is stored on.

field.name: scalar
field.documentation: Scalar representation of data. One scalar entry is stored per object in the subgrid.; The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float Vector(nobjects_subgrid). First dimension: object index.

field.name: vector
field.documentation: Vector representation of data. One vector is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float matrix(nobjects_subgrid, ndata).First dimension: object index, second dimension: index of data vector.

field.name: matrix
field.documentation: Matrix representation of data. One matrix is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; 3d float array(nobjects_subgrid,ndata1,ndata2). First dimension: object index, second dimension: matrix row, third dimension: matrix column.

field.name: measure
field.documentation: Measure of object, i.e. physical size (length for 1d, area for 2d, volume for 3d objects) in this geometry. [m^dim].; Use this field to store measures of implicitly defined grid objects.; Array of structures (number of subgrids this information is stored on)

field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this scalar quantity is associated with.

field.name: subgrid
field.documentation: Index of the subgrid (as stored in grid.subgrids) the data is stored on.

field.name: scalar
field.documentation: Scalar representation of data. One scalar entry is stored per object in the subgrid.; The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float Vector(nobjects_subgrid). First dimension: object index.

field.name: vector
field.documentation: Vector representation of data. One vector is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float matrix(nobjects_subgrid, ndata).First dimension: object index, second dimension: index of data vector.

field.name: matrix

field.name: bases
field.documentation: Vector bases. Used for aligned vector representation. Time-dependent; Array of structures (number of bases)

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this vector quantity is associated with.

field.name: label
field.documentation: Label describing the data

field.name: comp
field.documentation: Components of the vector. Array of structures (number of vector components). Time-dependent; FIXME: inherit time-dependence for this element

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this scalar quantity is associated with.

field.name: subgrid
field.documentation: Index of the subgrid (as stored in grid.subgrids) the data is stored on.

field.name: scalar
field.documentation: Scalar representation of data. One scalar entry is stored per object in the subgrid.; The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float Vector(nobjects_subgrid). First dimension: object index.

field.name: vector
field.documentation: Vector representation of data. One vector is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float matrix(nobjects_subgrid, ndata).First dimension: object index, second dimension: index of data vector.

field.name: align
field.documentation: Alignment flag for vector components. Integer vector (number of vector components).

field.name: alignid
field.documentation: Alignment id for vector components. String vector (number of vector components).

field.name: basis
field.documentation: Index of basis (defined in associated grid) this vector is aligned to; If set to GRID_UNDEFINED=0, the canonical basis of the default coordinates of the grid assumed.

field.name: species
field.documentation: Description of ion species. Array of structures(nspecies)

field.name: label
field.documentation: Name of species

field.name: amn
field.documentation: Atomic mass number of the species

field.name: zn
field.documentation: Nuclear charge of the impurity

field.name: zmin
field.documentation: Minimum Z of species charge state bundle

field.name: zmax
field.documentation: Maximum Z of species charge state bundle

field.name: compositions
field.documentation: Contains all the composition information for the simulation (main ions, impurities, neutrals, edge species).

field.name: nuclei
field.documentation: Array of nuclei considered.

field.name: zn
field.documentation: Nuclear charge [units of elementary charge];

field.name: amn
field.documentation: Mass of atom [amu]

field.name: label
field.documentation: String identifying element (e.g. H, D, T, He, C, ...)

field.name: ions
field.documentation: Array of main plasma ions.

field.name: nucindex
field.documentation: Index into list of nuclei; int

field.name: zion
field.documentation: Ion charge (of the dominant ionisation state; lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: imp_flag
field.documentation: Multiple charge state calculation flag : 0-Only one charge state is considered; 1-Multiple charge state are considered and are described in impurity CPO; Vector (nion)

field.name: label
field.documentation: String identifying ion (e.g. H+, D+, T+, He+2, C+, ...)

field.name: impurities
field.documentation: Array of impurities.

field.name: nucindex
field.documentation: Index into list of nuclei; int

field.name: i_ion
field.documentation: Index of the impurity species in the coreprof ion species ordering. Vector (nimp)

field.name: nzimp
field.documentation: Number of charge states (or bundles) considered for this impurity species.

field.name: zmin
field.documentation: Minimum Z of impurity ionisation state bundle. Vector (nzimp)

field.name: zmax
field.documentation: Maximum Z of impurity ionisation state bundle. If no bundle, zmax=zmin. Vector (nzimp)

field.name: label
field.documentation: String array (nzimp) identifying impurities (e.g. C+, C+2 , C+3, C+4, C+5, C+6, ...)

field.name: neutralscomp
field.documentation: Array of neutrals.

field.name: neutcomp
field.documentation: Array of components to the atom or molecule. Vector (ncomp)

field.name: nucindex
field.documentation: Index into list of nuclei; int

field.name: multiplicity
field.documentation: Multiplicity of the atom; int

field.name: type
field.documentation: Type of neutral, in terms of energy : 0=cold, 1=thermal, 2= fast, 3=NBI. Vector (ntype) of identifiers

field.name: id
field.documentation: Short string identifier

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Integer identifier

field.name: description
field.documentation: Verbose description of identifier

field.name: label
field.documentation: String identifying the atom or molecule (e.g. D2, DT, CD4, ...)

field.name: edgespecies
field.documentation: Array of edge species.

field.name: nucindex
field.documentation: Index into list of nuclei; int

field.name: zmin
field.documentation: Minimum Z of species charge state bundle

field.name: zmax
field.documentation: Maximum Z of species charge state bundle

field.name: label
field.documentation: String identifying the species (e.g. D0, D+, C0, C+, C+2, ...)

field.name: signature
field.documentation: Identifier for species choices. The goal of this is to uniquely capture the species blocks so that if the signatures are the same then the species blocks will also be the same.

field.name: id
field.documentation: Short string identifier

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Integer identifier

field.name: description
field.documentation: Verbose description of identifier

field.name: fluid
field.documentation: Fluid description of edge plasma. Time-dependent.

field.name: ne
field.documentation: Electron density [1/m^3]; Time-dependent;

field.name: value
field.documentation: Value of the quantity. Possibly stored on multiple subgrids.; Time-dependent; Array of structures (nsubgrid_quantity)

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this scalar quantity is associated with.

field.name: subgrid
field.documentation: Index of the subgrid (as stored in grid.subgrids) the data is stored on.

field.name: scalar
field.documentation: Scalar representation of data. One scalar entry is stored per object in the subgrid.; The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float Vector(nobjects_subgrid). First dimension: object index.

field.name: vector
field.documentation: Vector representation of data. One vector is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float matrix(nobjects_subgrid, ndata).First dimension: object index, second dimension: index of data vector.

field.name: matrix
field.documentation: Matrix representation of data. One matrix is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; 3d float array(nobjects_subgrid,ndata1,ndata2). First dimension: object index, second dimension: matrix row, third dimension: matrix column.

field.name: bndvalue
field.documentation: Boundary values of the quantity. Possibly stored on multiple (boundary) subgrids.; Time-dependent; Array of structures (nsubgrid_quantity)

field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this scalar quantity is associated with.

field.documentation: Label describing the data

field.documentation: Components of the vector. Array of structures (number of vector components). Time-dependent; FIXME: inherit time-dependence for this element

field.name: codeparam
field.documentation: Code parameters

field.name: codename
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: codeversion
field.documentation: Version of the code (as in the ITM repository)

field.name: parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_diag
field.documentation: List of the code specific diagnostic/output, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values meaning some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used. Exact rules could discussed and implemented in the module wrapper. Time-dependent.

field.name: time
field.documentation: Time [s]; Time-dependent; Scalar

CPO.documentation: Error field correction coils. Time-dependent CPO.

field.name: datainfo
field.documentation: Generic information on a data item

field.name: dataprovider
field.documentation: Name of the actual data provider (the person who filled the data)

field.name: putdate
field.documentation: Date at which the data has been put in the DB

field.name: source
field.documentation: Exact reference of the data source (e.g. original reference in the native machine data base)

field.name: comment
field.documentation: Any additional comment

field.name: cocos
field.documentation: COordinates COnventionS followed by this CPO

field.name: id
field.documentation: CPO id for checking its provenance in the workflow

field.name: isref
field.documentation: 1 if the data can be found in the present data base entry; 2 if the data can be found in a parent data base entry; 0 if no data consistent with the present entry can be found.

field.name: whatref
field.documentation: Structure defining a database entry and the CPO occurrence

field.name: user
field.documentation: Name of the user if private data, public if public ITM database.

field.name: machine
field.documentation: Name of the device

field.name: shot
field.documentation: Shot number

field.name: run
field.documentation: Run number

field.name: occurrence
field.documentation: Occurrence number of the CPO in the reference entry

field.name: putinfo
field.documentation: Level 2 information describing how to retrieve the actual data for the UAL. Not to be filled/used by the ITM user !

field.name: putmethod
field.documentation: Storage method for this data

field.name: putaccess
field.documentation: Instructions to access the data using this method

field.name: putlocation
field.documentation: Name of this data under this method

field.name: rights
field.documentation: Access rights to this data

field.name: coil
field.documentation: Individual coil. Time-dependent. Structure array. Replicate this coil structure for coil element in the efcc array.

field.name: desc_coils
field.documentation: Description of the coils

field.name: name
field.documentation: Name of coil.

field.name: res
field.documentation: Coil resistance [Ohm]

field.name: nturns
field.documentation: number of turns inside the coil

field.name: closed
field.documentation: Identify whether the coil is closed (y) or open (n). For closed coils there is no need to replicate the first r,z,phi point as last point

field.name: edges
field.documentation: Edges defining the coil volume faces. Structure array. Replicate this edge structure N-times for N-edge cross sections. Use just one for wire coil approximation.

field.name: edge_rzphi
field.documentation: Sequence of points describing a coil edge. Vector (npoints)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: coilcurrent
field.documentation: Circuit feed current in the coil, defined positive if it flows from point 1 to point 2 of the geometry description [A]; Time-dependent

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: abserror
field.documentation: Absolute error on signal; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: relerror
field.documentation: Relative error on signal (normalised to signal value); Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: coilvoltage
field.documentation: Voltage on the full coil [V]; Time-dependent

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: abserror
field.documentation: Absolute error on signal; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: relerror
field.documentation: Relative error on signal (normalised to signal value); Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: time
field.documentation: Time [s]; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.documentation: Code parameters

field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: diamagflux
field.documentation: Diamagnetic flux [Wb], defined as integral (Btor - Btor,vac) dS where the integral is over the poloidal cross section of the plasma. It is measured by a single wire loop around the cross section of the torus (e.g. Wesson, Tokamaks, 1997, p.473). It gives information about the separation of the two source profiles p' and FF' of the Grad-Shafranov equation.

field.name: flush
field.documentation: FLUSH package coefficients for the mapping of the equlibrium. The time grid of this structure is the same as the equilibrium structure above.

field.name: datainfo
field.documentation: Generic information on a data item

field.name: dataprovider
field.documentation: Name of the actual data provider (the person who filled the data)

field.name: putdate
field.documentation: Date at which the data has been put in the DB

field.name: source
field.documentation: Exact reference of the data source (e.g. original reference in the native machine data base)

field.name: comment
field.documentation: Any additional comment

field.name: cocos
field.documentation: COordinates COnventionS followed by this CPO

field.name: id
field.documentation: CPO id for checking its provenance in the workflow

field.name: isref
field.documentation: 1 if the data can be found in the present data base entry; 2 if the data can be found in a parent data base entry; 0 if no data consistent with the present entry can be found.

field.name: whatref
field.documentation: Structure defining a database entry and the CPO occurrence

field.name: user
field.documentation: Name of the user if private data, public if public ITM database.

field.name: machine
field.documentation: Name of the device

field.name: shot
field.documentation: Shot number

field.name: run
field.documentation: Run number

field.name: occurrence
field.documentation: Occurrence number of the CPO in the reference entry

field.name: putinfo
field.documentation: Level 2 information describing how to retrieve the actual data for the UAL. Not to be filled/used by the ITM user !

field.name: putmethod
field.documentation: Storage method for this data

field.name: putaccess
field.documentation: Instructions to access the data using this method

field.name: putlocation
field.documentation: Name of this data under this method

field.name: rights
field.documentation: Access rights to this data

field.name: position
field.documentation: Major radius and altitude of the FLUSH grid [m]; Time-dependent; Vectors resp. (nR) and (nZ)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: coef
field.documentation: Coefficients of the fit; Time-dependent; Matrix 2D (nR,nZ)

field.name: codeparam
field.documentation: Code parameters

field.name: codename
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: codeversion
field.documentation: Version of the code (as in the ITM repository)

field.name: parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_diag
field.documentation: List of the code specific diagnostic/output, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values meaning some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used. Exact rules could discussed and implemented in the module wrapper. Time-dependent.

field.name: global_param
field.documentation: 0d output parameters

field.name: beta_pol
field.documentation: poloidal beta; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: beta_tor
field.documentation: toroidal beta; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: beta_normal
field.documentation: normalised beta; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: i_plasma
field.documentation: total toroidal plasma current [A]; Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewed from above. Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: li
field.documentation: internal inductance; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: volume
field.documentation: total plasma volume [m^3]; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: area
field.documentation: area poloidal cross section [m^2]; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: psi_ax
field.documentation: poloidal flux at the magnetic axis [Wb]; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: psi_bound
field.documentation: poloidal flux at the selected plasma boundary (separatrix for a free boundary code; fixed boundary for fixed boundary code) [Wb]; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: mag_axis
field.documentation: Magnetic axis values

field.name: position
field.documentation: Position of the magnetic axis [m]; Time-dependent; Scalar;

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: bphi
field.documentation: Total toroidal magnetic field at the magnetic axis [T]; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: q
field.documentation: q at the magnetic axis; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: q_95
field.documentation: q at the 95% poloidal flux surface; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: q_min
field.documentation: minimum q value in the plasma; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: toroid_field
field.documentation: Characteristics of the vacuum toroidal field, redundant with the toroidfield CPO, to be used by the ETS

field.name: r0
field.documentation: Characteristic major radius of the device (used in publications, usually middle of the vessel at the equatorial midplane) [m]. Scalar.

field.name: b0
field.documentation: Vacuum field at r0 [T]; Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewed from above. Scalar. Time-dependent.

field.name: w_mhd
field.documentation: Plasma energy content = 3/2 * int(p,dV) with p being the total pressure (thermal + fast particles) [J]. Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: gamma
field.documentation: Adiabatic index. Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: profiles_1d
field.documentation: output profiles as a function of the poloidal flux

field.name: psi
field.documentation: Poloidal flux [Wb], without 1/2pi and such that Bp=|grad psi| /R/2/pi. Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: phi
field.documentation: toroidal flux [Wb]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: pressure
field.documentation: pressure profile as a function of the poloidal flux [Pa]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: F_dia
field.documentation: diamagnetic profile (R B_phi) [T m]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: pprime
field.documentation: psi derivative of the pressure profile [Pa/Wb]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: ffprime
field.documentation: psi derivative of F_dia multiplied with F_dia [T^2 m^2/Wb]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: jphi
field.documentation: flux surface averaged toroidal current density = average(jphi/R) / average(1/R) [A/m^2]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: jparallel
field.documentation: flux surface averaged parallel current density = average(j.B) / B0, where B0 = equilibrium/global_param/toroid_field/b0 ; [A/m^2]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: q
field.documentation: Safety factor = dphi/dpsi [-]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: r_inboard
field.documentation: radial coordinate (major radius) at the height and on the left of the magnetic axis [m]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: r_outboard
field.documentation: radial coordinate (major radius) at the height and on the right of the magnetic axis [m]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: rho_tor
field.documentation: Toroidal flux coordinate [m], to be used by the ETS and in many CPOs (coreprof, ...). Defined as sqrt(phi/pi/B0), where B0 = equilibrium/global_param/toroid_field/b0. Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: dpsidrho_tor
field.documentation: dpsi/drho_tor [Wb/m]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: rho_vol
field.documentation: Normalised radial coordinate related to the plasma volume. Defined as sqrt(volume / volume[LCFS]). Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: beta_pol
field.documentation: poloidal beta (inside the magnetic surface); Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: li
field.documentation: internal inductance (inside the magnetic surface); Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: elongation
field.documentation: Elongation; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: tria_upper
field.documentation: Upper triangularity profile; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: tria_lower
field.documentation: Lower triangularity profile; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: volume
field.documentation: Volume enclosed in the flux surface [m^3]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: vprime
field.documentation: Radial derivative of the volume enclosed in the flux surface with respect to psi, i.e. dV/dpsi [m^3/Wb]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: dvdrho
field.documentation: Radial derivative of the volume enclosed in the flux surface with respect to rho_tor, i.e. dV/drho_tor [m^2]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: area
field.documentation: Cross-sectional area of the flux surface [m^2]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: aprime
field.documentation: Radial derivative of the cross-sectional area of the flux surface with respect to psi, i.e. darea/dpsi [m^2/Wb]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: surface
field.documentation: Surface area of the flux surface [m^2]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: ftrap
field.documentation: Trapped particle fraction; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: gm1
field.documentation: average(1/R^2); Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: gm2
field.documentation: average(grad_rho^2/R^2); Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: gm3
field.documentation: average(grad_rho^2); Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: gm4
field.documentation: average(1/B^2) [T^-2]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: gm5
field.documentation: average(B^2) [T^2]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: gm6
field.documentation: average(grad_rho^2/B^2) [T^-2]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: gm7
field.documentation: average(grad_rho); Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: gm8
field.documentation: average(R); Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: gm9
field.documentation: average(1/R); Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: b_av
field.documentation: average(B); Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: b_min
field.documentation: minimum(B) on the flux surface; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: b_max
field.documentation: maximum(B) on the flux surface; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: omega
field.documentation: Toroidal rotation angular frequency (assumed constant on the flux surface) [rad/s]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: omegaprime
field.documentation: Psi derivative of the toroidal rotation angular frequency (assumed constant on the flux surface) [rad/(s.Wb)]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: mach_a
field.documentation: Alfvenic Mach number; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: phi_flow
field.documentation: Poloidal flow function phi_flow = rho*v_pol*B_pol[kg/(V.s^2)]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: s_flow
field.documentation: Definition to be provided; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: h_flow
field.documentation: flow function h_flow = gamma/(gamma-1)*s_flow*rho^(gamma-1) + 0.5*(phi_flow*B/rho)^2 - 0.5*(R*omega)^2 [m^2/s^2]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: rho_mass
field.documentation: Mass density [kg/m^3]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: profiles_2d
field.documentation: Output profiles in the poloidal plane. Time-dependent

field.name: grid_type
field.documentation: Selection of one of a set of grid types. 1-rectangular (R,Z) grid, in this case the position arrays should not be filled since they are redundant with grid/dim1 and dim2.

field.name: grid
field.documentation: definition of the 2D grid

field.name: dim1
field.documentation: First dimension values; Time-dependent; Vector (ndim1)

field.name: dim2
field.documentation: Second dimension values; Time-dependent; Vector (ndim2)

field.name: connect
field.documentation: In case of a finite elemnt representation, lists the points (3 for triangles, 4 for quadrangles) which define a finite element. In this case, ndim1=ndim2 and the value of grid_connect represents the index of the points in the list 1:ndim. E.g. : grid_connect(i,1:4) is a list of four integers [k1 k2 k3 k4] meaning that finite element #i is defined by the points (dim1(k1),dim2(k1)),(dim1(k2),dim2(k2)),(dim1(k3),dim2(k3)) and (dim1(k4),dim2(k4)); Time-dependent; Matrix of integers (nelement,4)

field.name: r
field.documentation: values of the major radius on the grid [m]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: z
field.documentation: values of the altitude on the grid [m]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: psi
field.documentation: values of the poloidal flux at the grid in the poloidal plane [Wb]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: theta
field.documentation: values of the poloidal angle on the grid [rad]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal flux [Wb]. Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: jphi
field.documentation: toroidal plasma current density [A m-2]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: jpar
field.documentation: parallel (to magnetic field) plasma current density [A m-2]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: br
field.documentation: R component of the poloidal magnetic field at the specified grid [T]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: bz
field.documentation: Z component of the poloidal magnetic field at the specified grid [T]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: bphi
field.documentation: toroidal component of the magnetic field at the specified grid [T]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: vphi
field.documentation: toroidal flow velocity [m/s]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: vtheta
field.documentation: Poloidal flow velocity [m/s]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: rho_mass
field.documentation: Mass density [kg/m^3]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: pressure
field.documentation: Pressure [Pa]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: temperature
field.documentation: Temperature [eV]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: coord_sys
field.documentation: flux surface coordinate system on a square grid of flux and angle

field.name: grid_type
field.documentation: Type of coordinate system

field.name: grid
field.documentation: Regular grid definition; Time-dependent

field.name: dim1
field.documentation: First dimension values; Vector (ndim1)

field.name: dim2
field.documentation: Second dimension values; Vector (ndim2)

field.name: jacobian
field.documentation: Jacobian of the coordinate system; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: g_11
field.documentation: metric coefficients g_11; g_ij=g^ij are contravariant metric tensor for the grid described by grid_type. Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: g_12
field.documentation: metric coefficients g_12; g_ij=g^ij are contravariant metric tensor for the grid described by grid_type. Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: g_13
field.documentation: metric coefficients g_13; g_ij=g^ij are contravariant metric tensor for the grid described by grid_type. Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: g_22
field.documentation: metric coefficients g_22; g_ij=g^ij are contravariant metric tensor for the grid described by grid_type. Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: g_23
field.documentation: metric coefficients g_23; g_ij=g^ij are contravariant metric tensor for the grid described by grid_type. Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: g_33
field.documentation: metric coefficients g_33; g_ij=g^ij are contravariant metric tensor for the grid described by grid_type. Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: position
field.documentation: R and Z position of grid points; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: time
field.documentation: Time [s]; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: codeparam
field.documentation: Code parameters

field.name: codename
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: codeversion
field.documentation: Version of the code (as in the ITM repository)

field.name: parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_diag
field.documentation: List of the code specific diagnostic/output, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values meaning some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used. Exact rules could discussed and implemented in the module wrapper. Time-dependent.

CPO.documentation: Fusion product diagnostics; Time-dependent CPO

field.name: datainfo
field.documentation: Generic information on a data item

field.name: dataprovider
field.documentation: Name of the actual data provider (the person who filled the data)

field.name: putdate
field.documentation: Date at which the data has been put in the DB

field.name: source
field.documentation: Exact reference of the data source (e.g. original reference in the native machine data base)

field.name: comment
field.documentation: Any additional comment

field.name: cocos
field.documentation: COordinates COnventionS followed by this CPO

field.name: id
field.documentation: CPO id for checking its provenance in the workflow

field.name: isref
field.documentation: 1 if the data can be found in the present data base entry; 2 if the data can be found in a parent data base entry; 0 if no data consistent with the present entry can be found.

field.name: whatref
field.documentation: Structure defining a database entry and the CPO occurrence

field.name: user
field.documentation: Name of the user if private data, public if public ITM database.

field.name: machine
field.documentation: Name of the device

field.name: shot
field.documentation: Shot number

field.name: run
field.documentation: Run number

field.name: occurrence
field.documentation: Occurrence number of the CPO in the reference entry

field.name: putinfo
field.documentation: Level 2 information describing how to retrieve the actual data for the UAL. Not to be filled/used by the ITM user !

field.name: putmethod
field.documentation: Storage method for this data

field.name: putaccess
field.documentation: Instructions to access the data using this method

field.name: putlocation
field.documentation: Name of this data under this method

field.name: rights
field.documentation: Access rights to this data

field.name: fus_product
field.documentation: Source. Time-dependent. Structure array. Replicate this source structure to accommodate neutron and gammas.

field.name: product
field.documentation: Type of fusion product (neutron,gamma)

field.name: reaction
field.documentation: Type of reaction involved (e.g. DD neutron, Be-alpha,n,gamma-C)

field.name: collimator
field.documentation: Collimator array.

field.name: colli_circ
field.documentation: Geometry of each channel of detector for circular cross section. Replicate this structure for each channel.

field.name: name
field.documentation: Name tag for the chord.

field.name: setup_line
field.documentation: Geometric description of the line of sight. First pivot close to detector position and second pivot at first wall hit.

field.name: pivot_point
field.documentation: Pivot point of each line of sight; Vector (nchords)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: horchordang1
field.documentation: Angle [rad] of horizontal projection of l.o.s. with poloidal cross section (0 for HFS to LFS chord - see Convention_angles_interfdiag.pdf) [rad]. Vector (nchords)

field.name: verchordang1
field.documentation: Angle of chord with vertical axis (0 for bottom-top chord, Pi for top-bottom chord - see Convention_angles_interfdiag.pdf) [rad]; Vector (nchords)

field.name: width
field.documentation: Width of the laser beam (1/e) [m]; Vector (nchords)

field.name: second_point
field.documentation: Second point defining the line of sight together with the pivot_point. In case the probing wave is reflected, this should be the position of the mirror. This data is redundant with horchordang1 and verchordang1. Vector (nchords).

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: horchordang2
field.documentation: For reflected l.o.s. only (undefined otherwise) : Angle [rad] of horizontal projection of reflected l.o.s. with poloidal cross section (0 for HFS to LFS chord - see Convention_angles_interfdiag.pdf) [rad]. Vector (nchords)

field.name: verchordang2
field.documentation: For reflected l.o.s. only (undefined otherwise) : Angle of reflected chord with vertical axis (0 for bottom-top chord, Pi for top-bottom chord - see Convention_angles_interfdiag.pdf) [rad]; Vector (nchords)

field.name: third_point
field.documentation: Third point defining the reflected line of sight together with the second_point (undefined if the probing wave is not reflected). This data is redundant with horchordang2 and verchordang2. Vector (nchords).

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: nchordpoints
field.documentation: Number of points along the viewing chords (used for synthetic diagnostic signal reconstruction)

field.name: colliunit
field.documentation: Detail of each collimator unit of each chord. Replicate this structure for each collimator.

field.name: radius
field.documentation: Radius of cross section; Typically dim=2 for just entry and exit of collimator; Vector (dim)

field.name: centre
field.documentation: Position of cross section centre; Typically dim=2 for just entry and exit of collimator; Vector (dim)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.documentation: Number of edges of cross section.

field.documentation: Coordinates of nodes defining each cross section; Typically dim=2 for just entry and exit of collimator; Vector (dim,nnodes)

field.documentation: Geometry of each channel of detector for arbitrary cross section. Replicate this structure for each channel.

field.documentation: Name tag for the chord. String.

field.name: voxels
field.documentation: Array of voxel structures defining the plasma region viewed from each collimator and scaling factor for effective solid angle for sources.

field.documentation: Centre of voxel; used also as origin of direction to detector

field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.documentation: Voxel Volume

field.name: solid_angle
field.documentation: effective solid angle (divided by 4pi) of the voxel towards detector.

field.documentation: Integrated emissivity [s^-1].

field.name: units
field.documentation: Energy units (ev, tof - time of flight)

field.documentation: Integrated emissivity for all spatial chords. Replicate the structure for each energy bin [s^-1]. Time-dependent

field.documentation: Name tag for each chord. Vector (nchords)

field.documentation: Energy like variable span. Use mininum energy when no energy spectra is resolved.

field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: detect_ct
field.documentation: Detected integrated emissivity for each chord as function of energy like variable. Replicate this structure for each chord. This structure contains the actual experimental data as obtained from the detector. To get from species emissivity to the detector counts a detector tranfer matrix is used (should be shot independent) since a monoenergetic beam will ultimately show up with a given spread in the detector channels. Each detector type or l.o.s. might have a dedicated detctor transfer matrix since the energy discrimination can vary. [s^-1]. Time-dependent

field.name: energy
field.documentation: Energy array of detected counts spectra. Vector (nenergy)

field.name: transf_mat
field.documentation: Transfer matrix of the detector. Each l.o.s. might have a dedicated detector response function and energy resolution (and number of cells). Time-independent. Matrix (ncells,nenergy)

field.name: parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_diag
field.documentation: List of the code specific diagnostic/output, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values meaning some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used. Exact rules could discussed and implemented in the module wrapper. Time-dependent.

field.documentation: Date at which the data has been put in the DB

field.name: source
field.documentation: Exact reference of the data source (e.g. original reference in the native machine data base)

field.name: comment
field.documentation: Any additional comment

field.name: cocos
field.documentation: COordinates COnventionS followed by this CPO

field.name: id
field.documentation: CPO id for checking its provenance in the workflow

field.name: isref
field.documentation: 1 if the data can be found in the present data base entry; 2 if the data can be found in a parent data base entry; 0 if no data consistent with the present entry can be found.

field.documentation: Structure defining a database entry and the CPO occurrence

field.documentation: Name of the user if private data, public if public ITM database.

field.name: setup
field.documentation: setup for the lines of sight of the line integrated measurement

field.name: name
field.documentation: Name of the channel. Array of strings (nlos).

field.name: pivot_point
field.documentation: Pivot point of l.o.s. it can be either the collimator position or entry point on the vessel. Vector (nlos)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: horchordang
field.documentation: Angle [rad] of horizontal projection of l.o.s. with poloidal cross section (0 for HFS to LFS trajectory - see Convention_angles_interfdiag.pdf) [rad]. Vector (nlos)

field.name: verchordang
field.documentation: Angle of l.o.s. with vertical axis (0 for bottom-top trajectory, Pi for top-bottom trajectory - see Convention_angles_interfdiag.pdf) [rad]; Vector (npos)

field.name: second_point
field.documentation: Second point defining the l.o.s. together with the pivot_point. Vector (nlos)

field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: solidangle
field.documentation: Solid angle of the detector; [sr] Vector (nlos)

field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Vector

field.documentation: Absolute error on signal; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: relerror
field.documentation: Relative error on signal (normalised to signal value); Time-dependent; Vector

field.documentation: Measured light intensity (a.u.). Time-dependent. Vector (nlos)

field.documentation: CPO id for checking its provenance in the workflow

field.name: isref
field.documentation: 1 if the data can be found in the present data base entry; 2 if the data can be found in a parent data base entry; 0 if no data consistent with the present entry can be found.

field.documentation: Structure defining a database entry and the CPO occurrence

field.name: user
field.documentation: Name of the user if private data, public if public ITM database.

field.documentation: Name of the device

field.documentation: Shot number

field.documentation: Level 2 information describing how to retrieve the actual data for the UAL. Not to be filled/used by the ITM user !

field.documentation: Storage method for this data

field.documentation: Instructions to access the data using this method

field.documentation: Name of this data under this method

field.documentation: Access rights to this data

field.name: expression
field.documentation: Formal expression for the line integral to be evaluated as a function of ne, ni, Te, Ti, Zeff, Br, Bz

field.name: setup_line
field.documentation: Geometric description of the lines of sight

field.name: pivot_point
field.documentation: Pivot point of each line of sight; Vector (nchords)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: horchordang1
field.documentation: Angle [rad] of horizontal projection of l.o.s. with poloidal cross section (0 for HFS to LFS chord - see Convention_angles_interfdiag.pdf) [rad]. Vector (nchords)

field.name: verchordang1
field.documentation: Angle of chord with vertical axis (0 for bottom-top chord, Pi for top-bottom chord - see Convention_angles_interfdiag.pdf) [rad]; Vector (nchords)

field.name: width
field.documentation: Width of the laser beam (1/e) [m]; Vector (nchords)

field.name: second_point
field.documentation: Second point defining the line of sight together with the pivot_point. In case the probing wave is reflected, this should be the position of the mirror. This data is redundant with horchordang1 and verchordang1. Vector (nchords).

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: horchordang2
field.documentation: For reflected l.o.s. only (undefined otherwise) : Angle [rad] of horizontal projection of reflected l.o.s. with poloidal cross section (0 for HFS to LFS chord - see Convention_angles_interfdiag.pdf) [rad]. Vector (nchords)

field.name: verchordang2
field.documentation: For reflected l.o.s. only (undefined otherwise) : Angle of reflected chord with vertical axis (0 for bottom-top chord, Pi for top-bottom chord - see Convention_angles_interfdiag.pdf) [rad]; Vector (nchords)

field.name: third_point
field.documentation: Third point defining the reflected line of sight together with the second_point (undefined if the probing wave is not reflected). This data is redundant with horchordang2 and verchordang2. Vector (nchords).

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: nchordpoints
field.documentation: Number of points along the viewing chords (used for synthetic diagnostic signal reconstruction)

field.name: measure
field.documentation: Measured value. Time-dependent; Vector (nchords)

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: abserror
field.documentation: Absolute error on signal; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: relerror
field.documentation: Relative error on signal (normalised to signal value); Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: time
field.documentation: Time [s]; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.documentation: Occurrence number of the CPO in the reference entry

field.name: putinfo
field.documentation: Level 2 information describing how to retrieve the actual data for the UAL. Not to be filled/used by the ITM user !

field.name: putmethod
field.documentation: Storage method for this data

field.name: putaccess
field.documentation: Instructions to access the data using this method

field.name: putlocation
field.documentation: Name of this data under this method

field.documentation: Access rights to this data

field.name: name
field.documentation: Antenna name, Vector of strings (nantenna)

field.name: type
field.documentation: Wave type (LH, EC, IC, ...), Vector of strings (nantenna)

field.name: frequency
field.documentation: Wave frequency [Hz], Vector (nantenna).

field.name: mode
field.documentation: Incoming wave mode (+ 1 : slow wave only; -1 both slow and fast wave modes). Vector of integers (nantenna). Time-dependent

field.name: position
field.documentation: Reference global position of the antenna. Time-dependent

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: spectrum
field.documentation: Spectral properties of the wave.

field.name: phi_theta
field.documentation: Power spectrum as a function of the refractive index in the toroidal and poloidal directions.

field.name: nn_phi
field.documentation: Number of points for the discretization of the spectrum in the toroidal direction, Vector of integers (nantenna).

field.name: nn_theta
field.documentation: Number of points for the discretization of the spectrum in the poloidal direction, Vector of integers (nantenna).

field.name: n_phi
field.documentation: Refraction index in the toroidal direction, Matrix (nantenna,max_nn_phi).

field.name: n_theta
field.documentation: Refraction index in poloidal direction, Matrix (nantenna,max_nn_theta).

field.name: power
field.documentation: W/dNphi/dNtheta [W], Array (nantenna, max_nn_phi, max_nn_theta). Time-dependent

field.name: parallel
field.documentation: Power spectrum as a function of the parallel refractive index.

field.name: nn_par
field.documentation: Number of points for the discretization of the spectrum in the poloidal direction, Vector of integers (nantenna).

field.name: n_par
field.documentation: Refraction index in the parallel direction, Matrix (nantenna,max_nn_par).

field.name: power
field.documentation: W/dN_par [W], Matrix(nantenna, max_nn_par). Time-dependent

field.name: beam
field.documentation: Beam characteristics

field.name: spot
field.documentation: Spot characteristics

field.name: waist
field.documentation: Waist for the spot ellipse [m], Matrix (nantenna,2). Time-dependent

field.name: angle
field.documentation: Rotation angle for the spot ellipse [rd], Vector(nantenna). Time-dependent

field.name: phaseellipse
field.documentation: Phase ellipse characteristics of the spot

field.name: invcurvrad
field.documentation: Inverse curvature radii for the phase ellipse [m-1], Matrix (nantenna,2). Time-dependent

field.name: angle
field.documentation: Rotation angle for the phase ellipse [rd], Vector(nantenna). Time-dependent

field.name: codeparam
field.documentation: Code parameters

field.name: codename
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: codeversion
field.documentation: Version of the code (as in the ITM repository)

field.name: parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_diag
field.documentation: List of the code specific diagnostic/output, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values meaning some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used. Exact rules could discussed and implemented in the module wrapper. Time-dependent.

field.name: time
field.documentation: Time [s]; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: limiter_unit
field.documentation: Vector of limiting surfaces. Replicate this limiter_unit element ncomponents times. Each unit contains a plasma facing component that can have dedicated number of points. Array of structures (ncomponents)

field.documentation: Name or description of the limiter_unit

field.name: closed
field.documentation: Identify whether the contour is closed (y) or open (n)

field.documentation: Position (R,Z coordinates) of a limiting surface. No need to repeat first point for closed contours [m]; Vector(npoints)

field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: eta
field.documentation: Wall resistivity [ohm.m]; Scalar

field.name: delta
field.documentation: Wall thickness [m] (Optional if a closed facing component is given but useful for simpler closed contour limiter); Scalar

field.name: permeability
field.documentation: Vessel relative permeability; Scalar
