field.name: wall2d_mhd
field.documentation: Simplified wall that encloses necessary information for RWM codes.

field.name: id
field.documentation: Short string identifier

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Integer identifier

field.name: description
field.documentation: Verbose description of identifier

field.name: res_wall
field.documentation: Resistive Wall(s).

field.name: walltype
field.documentation: Tag the type of wall to be used, 0 (conformal) or 1 (free)

field.name: id
field.documentation: Short string identifier

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Integer identifier

field.name: description
field.documentation: Verbose description of identifier

field.name: delta
field.documentation: Wall thickness [m]; Scalar

field.name: eta
field.documentation: Wall resistivity [ohm.m]; Scalar

field.name: npoloidal
field.documentation: Number of poloidal coordinates for each wall (dimension of R and Z);

field.name: position
field.documentation: RZ description of the wall; wall coordinates are defined at a middle line (line passing through the middle of the real wall as defined by thickness parameter delta)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: holes
field.documentation: Structure to describe the placing and properties of the holes

field.name: n_holes
field.documentation: Number of holes on each wall;

field.name: coordinates
field.documentation: Poloidal and Toroidal coordinates of the center of each hole;

field.name: theta
field.documentation: Theta coordinate of holes center; Vector (n_holes)

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal coordinate of holes center; Vector (n_holes)

field.name: width
field.documentation: Angular width of each in the poloidal and toroidal direction;

field.name: dtheta
field.documentation: Angular poloidal width of holes; Vector (n_holes)

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Angular toroidal width of holes; Vector (n_holes)

field.name: eta
field.documentation: Resistivity of each hole [ohm.m]; Vector (n_holes)

field.name: ideal_wall
field.documentation: Ideal wall

field.name: walltype
field.documentation: Tag the type of wall to be used, 0 (conformal) or 1 (free)

field.name: id
field.documentation: Short string identifier

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Integer identifier

field.name: description
field.documentation: Verbose description of identifier

field.name: position
field.documentation: RZ description of the wall;

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: wall0d
field.documentation: Simple 0D description of plasma-wall interaction

field.name: pumping_speed
field.documentation: pumping speed; Time-dependent. vector(nneut); [particles/s]

field.name: gas_puff
field.documentation: gas puff; vector(nneut); Time-dependent. [particles/s]

field.name: wall_inventory
field.documentation: wall inventory; vector(nneut); Time-dependent. [particles]

field.name: recycling_coefficient
field.documentation: Recycling coefficient. Vector(nneut) Time-dependent.

field.name: wall_temperature
field.documentation: Wall temperature [K]. Time-dependent. Scalar

field.name: power_from_plasma
field.documentation: Power flowing from the plasma to the wall [W]. Time-dependent. Scalar

field.name: power_to_cooling
field.documentation: Power to cooling systems [W]. Time-dependent. Scalar

field.name: species_index
field.documentation: Index of species into wall/compositions; matrix(nspecies,3); 1st element indicates {1: main ions; 2:impurities; 3:neutrals; 4:edge species); 2nd element indicates index into that array; 3rd index indicates charge state if 1st element points to inpurities or neutral type if 1st element points to neutrals;

field.name: flux
field.documentation: flux of species indicated by species_index; array of nspecies; positive implies incoming onto wall; negative implies sent back into plasma; time-dependent; [particles/s]

field.name: energy
field.documentation: energy flux of species indicated by species_index; array of nspecies; positive implies incoming onto wall; negative implies sent back into plasma; time-dependent; [W]

field.name: wall2d
field.documentation: 2D wall type. Structure array. Replicate this element for each type of possible physics configurations necessary (single contour limiter, disjoints gapped plasma facing components)

field.name: wall_id
field.documentation: Use this identifier to tag the type of 2d wall you are using. Use 0 for single contour limiter and 1 for disjoint PFC structure like first wall.

field.name: id
field.documentation: Short string identifier

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Integer identifier

field.name: description
field.documentation: Verbose description of identifier

field.name: limiter
field.documentation: Description of the immobile limiting surface(s) or plasma facing components for defining the Last Closed Flux Surface.

field.name: limiter_unit
field.documentation: Vector of limiting surfaces. Replicate this limiter_unit element ncomponents times. Each unit contains a plasma facing component that can have dedicated number of points. Array of structures (ncomponents)

field.name: name
field.documentation: Name or description of the limiter_unit

field.name: closed
field.documentation: Identify whether the contour is closed (y) or open (n)

field.name: position
field.documentation: Position (R,Z coordinates) of a limiting surface. No need to repeat first point for closed contours [m]; Vector(npoints)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: eta
field.documentation: Wall resistivity [ohm.m]; Scalar

field.name: delta
field.documentation: Wall thickness [m] (Optional if a closed facing component is given but useful for simpler closed contour limiter); Scalar

field.name: permeability
field.documentation: Vessel relative permeability; Scalar

field.name: vessel
field.documentation: Mechanical structure of the vacuum vessel. Vessel assumed as set of nested layers with given physics properties; Each vessel layer can be either a simple annular structure of given radial thickness or be made from a set of individual blocks with a given resistivity.

field.name: vessel_unit
field.documentation: Vector of vacuum vessel units. Replicate this vessel_unit element ncomponents times. Each unit contains a mechanical structure of the vessel with distinct physics properties. Array of structures (ncomponents)

field.name: annular
field.documentation: Vector of vacuum vessel units. Replicate this vessel_unit element ncomponents times. Each unit contains a mechanical structure of the vessel with distinct physics properties. Array of structures (ncomponents)

field.name: name
field.documentation: Name or description of the vessel_unit

field.name: inside
field.documentation: Inner Vessel wall outline (list of R,Z co-ordinates) [m]; Vector (npoints_inner)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: outside
field.documentation: Outer Vessel wall outline (list of R,Z co-ordinates) [m]; Vector (npoints_inner)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: eta
field.documentation: Vessel resistivity [ohm.m]; Scalar

field.name: permeability
field.documentation: Vessel relative permeability; Scalar

field.name: blocks
field.documentation: Vector of vacuum vessel units. Replicate this vessel_unit element ncomponents times. Each unit contains a mechanical structure of the vessel with distinct physics properties. Array of structures (ncomponents)

field.name: blocks_unit
field.documentation: Vector of blocks that build of the vessel layer. Replicate this element nblocks times. Each unit contains a building block of the vessel and can have dedicated number of points. Array of structures (nblocks)

field.name: name
field.documentation: Name or description of the blocks_unit

field.name: position
field.documentation: Position (R,Z coordinates) of a vessel segment. No need to repeat first point for closed contours [m]; Vector(npoints)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: eta
field.documentation: Resistivity of the vessel segment [ohm.m]; Scalar

field.name: permeability
field.documentation: Vessel relative permeability; Scalar

field.name: wall3d
field.documentation: A 3D wall type; Time-dependent; Structure array. Replicate this element for each type of possible physics configurations necessary (gas thight vs wall with ports and holes)

field.name: id
field.documentation: Short string identifier

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Integer identifier

field.name: description
field.documentation: Verbose description of identifier

field.name: grid
field.documentation: Grid description

field.name: uid
field.documentation: Unique index of this grid. Used for handling multiple grids

field.name: id
field.documentation: Name / identifier string for this grid

field.name: spaces
field.documentation: Definitions of grid spaces. Array of structures (number of spaces)

field.name: geotype
field.documentation: Type of space geometry (id flags). Flags defining how the geometry (objects.geo) fields associated with; space objects are to be interpreted. Array (number of geometries defined for this space),; first dimension: geometry index. A flag value of GRID_UNDEFINED=0 indicates the standard interpretation for; the given coordinates.

field.name: geotypeid
field.documentation: Type of space geometries (id string). See geotype.

field.name: coordtype
field.documentation: Type of coordinates describing the physical space. Vector (number of space dimensions); The size of coordtype defines the dimension of the space.; For predefined integer constants for standard coordinates see; the documentation of the grid service library.

field.name: objects
field.documentation: Definition of the space objects.; Array of structures (dimension of highest-dimensional objects).; First dimension: dimension of the objects (1=nodes, 2=edges, 3=faces, 4=cells/volumes, ...)

field.name: boundary
field.documentation: Lists of (n-1)-dimensional space objects defining the boundary of an n-dimensional space object.; Matrix(number of objects of dimension n, maximum number of boundary objects).; First dimension: object index, second dimension: boundary object index

field.name: neighbour
field.documentation: Connectivity information. Array (number of objects, maximum number of boundaries per object, maximum number of neighbours per boundary).; Stores the indices of the n-dimensional objects adjacent to the given n-dimensional object.;An object can possibly have multiple neighbours on every boundary.; First dimension: object index, second dimension: boundary index, third dimension: neighbour index on the boundary.

field.name: geo
field.documentation: Geometry data matrix associated with every object. Float array (number of objects, number of geometry coeff. 1, number of geometry coeff. 2, number of geometries).; The exact definition depends on the geometry type of the space (complexgrid_space.geotype).; First dimension: object index, second+third dimension: geometry coefficient matrix row+column, third dimension: geometry index (for definition of multiple geometries).

field.name: measure
field.documentation: Measure of space objects, i.e. physical size (length for 1d, area for 2d, volume for 3d objects,...). [m^dim].; First dimension: object index, second dimension: geometry index

field.name: xpoints
field.documentation: List of indices of all nodes which are x-points. Vector (number of x-points)

field.name: subgrids
field.documentation: Definitions of subgrids. Array of structures (number of subgrids)

field.name: id
field.documentation: ID string (name) of the subgrid.

field.name: list
field.documentation: List of object lists. Array of structures (number of object lists).

field.name: cls
field.documentation: Class tuple of the grid objects in this object list. Vector (number of grid spaces)

field.name: indset
field.documentation: Implicit list of the object indices.; Array of structures (number of grid spaces = length of index tuple). Every index of the index tuple is described by an index set, which defines either a list of index values or a range of index values.

field.name: range
field.documentation: Defines an index range enumerating from range[1] to range[2] (with both range[1] and range[2] included). If additionally a third value range(3) is given, it is used as a stride. If it is omitted, a stride of 1 is assumed. Vector(3)

field.name: ind
field.documentation: An explicit list of indices. If this member is defined and has nonzero size, the list is assumed to be explicit. Vector(length of explicit index list)

field.name: ind
field.documentation: Explicit list of index tuples. Matrix (number of objects, number of spaces in grid).; First dimension: object index, second dimension: index tuple/space index.; If this field is defined and has nonzero size, the object list is understood to be explicit.

field.name: metric
field.documentation: Metric coefficients

field.name: measure
field.documentation: Measure of object, i.e. physical size (length for 1d, area for 2d, volume for 3d objects). [m^dim].; Use this field to store measures of implicitly defined grid objects.; Array of structures (number of subgrids this information is stored on)

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this scalar quantity is associated with.

field.name: subgrid
field.documentation: Index of the subgrid (as stored in grid.subgrids) the data is stored on.

field.name: scalar
field.documentation: Scalar representation of data. One scalar entry is stored per object in the subgrid.; The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float Vector(nobjects_subgrid). First dimension: object index.

field.name: vector
field.documentation: Vector representation of data. One vector is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float matrix(nobjects_subgrid, ndata).First dimension: object index, second dimension: index of data vector.

field.name: matrix
field.documentation: Matrix representation of data. One matrix is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; 3d float array(nobjects_subgrid,ndata1,ndata2). First dimension: object index, second dimension: matrix row, third dimension: matrix column.

field.name: g11
field.documentation: Metric coefficients g11. Array of structures (number of subgrids this information is stored on)

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this scalar quantity is associated with.

field.name: subgrid
field.documentation: Index of the subgrid (as stored in grid.subgrids) the data is stored on.

field.documentation: Matrix representation of data. One matrix is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; 3d float array(nobjects_subgrid,ndata1,ndata2). First dimension: object index, second dimension: matrix row, third dimension: matrix column.

field.documentation: Jacobian. Array of structures (number of subgrids this information is stored on)

field.name: geo
field.documentation: Geometry data for implicit objects

field.name: geotype
field.documentation: Type of geometry (id flag). A flag defining how the geometry data associated with grid objects is to be interpreted. If the field is undefined (0=GRID_UNDEFINED), the standard interpretation for; the given coordinate types is assumed.

field.name: geotypeid
field.documentation: Type of geometry (id string).

field.name: coordtype
field.documentation: Type of coordinates describing the physical space. Vector (number of space dimensions); The size of coordtype defines the dimension of the space.; For predefined integer constants for standard coordinates see; the documentation of the grid service library.

field.name: geo_matrix
field.documentation: Geometry data matrix associated with implicit objects. Array of structures (number of subgrids this information is stored on); The exact definition of the stored values depends on the geometry type of the geometry complexgrid_geo_global.geotype;

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this scalar quantity is associated with.

field.name: subgrid
field.documentation: Index of the subgrid (as stored in grid.subgrids) the data is stored on.

field.documentation: Scalar representation of data. One scalar entry is stored per object in the subgrid.; The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float Vector(nobjects_subgrid). First dimension: object index.

field.name: vector
field.documentation: Vector representation of data. One vector is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float matrix(nobjects_subgrid, ndata).First dimension: object index, second dimension: index of data vector.

field.name: matrix
field.documentation: Matrix representation of data. One matrix is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; 3d float array(nobjects_subgrid,ndata1,ndata2). First dimension: object index, second dimension: matrix row, third dimension: matrix column.

field.name: bases
field.documentation: Vector bases. Used for aligned vector representation. Time-dependent; Array of structures (number of bases)

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this vector quantity is associated with.

field.name: label
field.documentation: Label describing the data

field.name: comp
field.documentation: Components of the vector. Array of structures (number of vector components). Time-dependent; FIXME: inherit time-dependence for this element

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this scalar quantity is associated with.

field.name: subgrid
field.documentation: Index of the subgrid (as stored in grid.subgrids) the data is stored on.

field.name: scalar
field.documentation: Scalar representation of data. One scalar entry is stored per object in the subgrid.; The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float Vector(nobjects_subgrid). First dimension: object index.

field.name: vector
field.documentation: Vector representation of data. One vector is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float matrix(nobjects_subgrid, ndata).First dimension: object index, second dimension: index of data vector.

field.name: matrix
field.documentation: Matrix representation of data. One matrix is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; 3d float array(nobjects_subgrid,ndata1,ndata2). First dimension: object index, second dimension: matrix row, third dimension: matrix column.

field.name: align
field.documentation: Alignment flag for vector components. Integer vector (number of vector components).

field.name: alignid
field.documentation: Alignment id for vector components. String vector (number of vector components).

field.name: basis
field.documentation: Index of basis (defined in associated grid) this vector is aligned to; If set to GRID_UNDEFINED=0, the canonical basis of the default coordinates of the grid assumed.

field.name: plasma
field.documentation: Plasma flux from/to plasma facing wall surfaces

field.name: flux
field.documentation: Flux density of incoming particle flux [particles/(m^2 s)]; Time-dependent; Array of structures(number of plasma species); First dimension: index of plasma species (as given in species array)

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this scalar quantity is associated with.

field.name: subgrid
field.documentation: Index of the subgrid (as stored in grid.subgrids) the data is stored on.

field.documentation: Scalar representation of data. One scalar entry is stored per object in the subgrid.; The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float Vector(nobjects_subgrid). First dimension: object index.

field.documentation: Matrix representation of data. One matrix is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; 3d float array(nobjects_subgrid,ndata1,ndata2). First dimension: object index, second dimension: matrix row, third dimension: matrix column.

field.name: b
field.documentation: Magnetic field vector at the surface [T]; Time-dependent;

field.name: label
field.documentation: Label describing the data

field.name: comp
field.documentation: Components of the vector. Vector of griddata(ndim). Time-dependent; FIXME: inherit time-dependence for this element

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this scalar quantity is associated with.

field.name: subgrid
field.documentation: Index of the subgrid (as stored in grid.subgrids) the data is stored on.

field.documentation: Scalar representation of data. One scalar entry is stored per object in the subgrid.; The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float Vector(nobjects_subgrid). First dimension: object index.

field.name: vector
field.documentation: Vector representation of data. One vector is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float matrix(nobjects_subgrid, ndata).First dimension: object index, second dimension: index of data vector.

field.name: matrix
field.documentation: Matrix representation of data. One matrix is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; 3d float array(nobjects_subgrid,ndata1,ndata2). First dimension: object index, second dimension: matrix row, third dimension: matrix column.

field.name: align
field.documentation: Alignment of vector components, numerical flag. Int vector(ndim)

field.name: alignid
field.documentation: Alignment of vector components, string description. String vector(ndim)

field.name: energy
field.documentation: Average energy of incoming particles [eV]; Time-dependent; Array of structures (number of plasma species)

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this scalar quantity is associated with.

field.name: subgrid
field.documentation: Index of the subgrid (as stored in grid.subgrids) the data is stored on.

field.name: scalar
field.documentation: Scalar representation of data. One scalar entry is stored per object in the subgrid.; The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float Vector(nobjects_subgrid). First dimension: object index.

field.name: vector
field.documentation: Vector representation of data. One vector is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float matrix(nobjects_subgrid, ndata).First dimension: object index, second dimension: index of data vector.

field.name: matrix
field.documentation: Matrix representation of data. One matrix is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; 3d float array(nobjects_subgrid,ndata1,ndata2). First dimension: object index, second dimension: matrix row, third dimension: matrix column.

field.name: species
field.documentation: Definition of plasma species (ions+neutrals); Array of structures (number of species)

field.name: label
field.documentation: Name of species

field.name: amn
field.documentation: Atomic mass number of the species

field.name: zn
field.documentation: Nuclear charge of the impurity

field.name: zmin
field.documentation: Minimum Z of species charge state bundle

field.name: zmax
field.documentation: Maximum Z of species charge state bundle

field.name: surface
field.documentation: State of plasma facing wall surfaces

field.name: ref_wall_typ
field.documentation: List of reference wall compositions; Array of structures (number of reference compositions)

field.name: label
field.documentation: Label for this reference wall type

field.name: thickness
field.documentation: Thickness(m). Float vector, dimensions: 1. layer index

field.name: stochiometry
field.documentation: Material composition of layer. Float matrix, dimensions: 1. layer index, 2. element number (numbering as in surface.elements/surface.compound array)

field.name: dx
field.documentation: Cell spacings for 1d layer height discretization; Float matrix (max. number of cells for layer, layer index), dimensions: 1. cell index, 2. layer index

field.name: wall_type
field.documentation: Definition of reference wall composition for every wall element; All other fields in this surface data structure refer to the geometric objects identified by the grid/subgrid in this field, in exactly the order given by the subgrid.

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this scalar quantity is associated with.

field.name: subgrid
field.documentation: Index of the subgrid (as stored in grid.subgrids) the data is stored on.

field.name: scalar
field.documentation: Scalar representation of data. One scalar entry is stored per object in the subgrid.; The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float Vector(nobjects_subgrid). First dimension: object index.

field.name: vector
field.documentation: Vector representation of data. One vector is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float matrix(nobjects_subgrid, ndata).First dimension: object index, second dimension: index of data vector.

field.name: matrix
field.documentation: Matrix representation of data. One matrix is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; 3d float array(nobjects_subgrid,ndata1,ndata2). First dimension: object index, second dimension: matrix row, third dimension: matrix column.

field.name: layers
field.documentation: Data on wall element layers

field.name: density
field.documentation: Density of the surface layers [kg/m^3]; Time-dependent; Float matrix (max. number of layers, number of elements); First dimension: index of surface layer, second element: index of wall element

field.name: thickness
field.documentation: Thickness of surface layer [m]; Time-dependent; Float matrix (max. number of layers, number of elements); First dimension: index of surface layer, second element: index of wall element

field.name: roughness
field.documentation: Surface roughness [m] (surface between this layer and the one above it towards the plasma); Time-dependent; Float matrix (max. number of layers, number of elements); First dimension: index of surface layer, second element: index of wall element

field.name: t
field.documentation: Temperature in layer [K]; Time-dependent; 3d float array, dimensions: 1. cell index of 1d layer height discretization, 2. layer index, 3. wall element index

field.name: element_frac
field.documentation: Elemental composition; Time-dependent; Float 3d array (max. number of tracked elements, max. number of layers, number of wall elements); Dimensions: 1. index of tracked element (c.f. surface.elements list), 2. layer index, 3. wall element index

field.name: chem_comp
field.documentation: Chemical composition, referring to the list surface.compounds; Time-dependent; 3d float array, dimensions: 1. index of tracked compound, 2. index of layer, 3. index of wall element

field.name: h_inventory
field.documentation: Data on wall element hydrogen inventories

field.name: surf_trap_de
field.documentation: Density of hydrogen traps on internal surfaces [1/m^2]; Time-dependent; 5d float array; Dimensions: 1. compound type (indexing as in chemical_comp), 2. trap type, 3. cell index of 1d layer height discretization; 4. layer index; 5. wall element index

field.name: bulk_trap_de
field.documentation: Density of hydrogen traps in bulk material [1/m^3]; Time-dependent; 5d float array; Dimensions: see surface_trap_density

field.name: bulk_D
field.documentation: Diffusivity of hydrogen species in bulks of different compounds; Time-dependent; 5d float array. Dimensions: 1. index of compound (indexing as in chemical_comp), 2. index of hydrogen isotope, 3. cell index of 1d layer height discretization, 4. layer index, 5. wall element index

field.name: surface_D
field.documentation: Diffusivity of hydrogen species of surface of different compounds; Time-dependent; Dimensions: see bulk_D

field.name: bulk_C_s
field.documentation: Bulk mobile (solute) concentration [atoms/m^3]; Time-dependent; Dimensions: see bulk_D

field.name: surface_C_s
field.documentation: Surface mobile (solute) concentration [atoms/m^2]; Time-dependent; Dimensions: see bulk_D

field.name: bulk_C_t
field.documentation: Bulk trapped concentration [atoms/m^3]; Time-dependent; Dimensions: see bulk_D

field.name: surface_C_t
field.documentation: Surface trapped concentration [atoms/m^2]; Time-dependent; Dimensions: see bulk_D

field.name: surf_recrate
field.documentation: Recombination rate on surface (only for pure elements, not compounds) [molecules*m^2/s]; Time-dependent; Dimensions: see bulk_D

field.name: elements
field.documentation: Description of atomic elements used in wall element layer compositions

field.name: label
field.documentation: Element name/label

field.name: zn
field.documentation: Nuclear charge

field.name: amn
field.documentation: Nuclear mass

field.name: density
field.documentation: Material density (atoms/m^3)

field.name: compounds
field.documentation: Description of chemical compounds used in wall element layer compositions

field.name: label
field.documentation: Compound name/label

field.name: stochiometry
field.documentation: Composition of the compound. Float vector, dimensions: 1. element number (numbering as in surface.elements array)

field.name: density
field.documentation: Compound density (molecules/m^3)

field.name: time
field.documentation: Time [s]; Time-dependent; Scalar

CPO.documentation: RF wave propagation and deposition. Time-dependent CPO

field.name: datainfo
field.documentation: Generic information on a data item

field.name: dataprovider
field.documentation: Name of the actual data provider (the person who filled the data)

field.name: putdate
field.documentation: Date at which the data has been put in the DB

field.name: source
field.documentation: Exact reference of the data source (e.g. original reference in the native machine data base)

field.name: comment
field.documentation: Any additional comment

field.name: cocos
field.documentation: COordinates COnventionS followed by this CPO

field.name: id
field.documentation: CPO id for checking its provenance in the workflow

field.name: isref
field.documentation: 1 if the data can be found in the present data base entry; 2 if the data can be found in a parent data base entry; 0 if no data consistent with the present entry can be found.

field.name: whatref
field.documentation: Structure defining a database entry and the CPO occurrence

field.name: user
field.documentation: Name of the user if private data, public if public ITM database.

field.name: machine
field.documentation: Name of the device

field.name: shot
field.documentation: Shot number

field.name: run
field.documentation: Run number

field.name: occurrence
field.documentation: Occurrence number of the CPO in the reference entry

field.name: putinfo
field.documentation: Level 2 information describing how to retrieve the actual data for the UAL. Not to be filled/used by the ITM user !

field.name: putmethod
field.documentation: Storage method for this data

field.name: putaccess
field.documentation: Instructions to access the data using this method

field.name: putlocation
field.documentation: Name of this data under this method

field.name: rights
field.documentation: Access rights to this data

field.name: coherentwave
field.documentation: Wave description for each frequency. Time-dependent. Structure array(nfreq)

field.name: wave_id
field.documentation: Identifier for the coherent-wave, in terms of the type and name of the antenna driving the wave and an index separating waves driven by the same antenna. Possible types: EC/LH/IC; the field name should include the name of the antenna as specified in either antennas(*)%ec_antenna%name, antennas(*)%ic_antenna%name, or antennas(*)%lh_antenna%name; the field index should separate different waves generated from a single antenna.

field.name: type
field.documentation: Identify the type of the object or process.

field.name: id
field.documentation: Short string identifier

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Integer identifier

field.name: description
field.documentation: Verbose description of identifier

field.name: name
field.documentation: The name of the object or process. Here the object should be an instans of the type specified in the field type.

field.name: index
field.documentation: Index the separating objects or processes with the same name.

field.name: composition
field.documentation: Plasma composition (description of ion species).

field.name: amn
field.documentation: Atomic mass number (lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: zn
field.documentation: Nuclear charge (lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: zion
field.documentation: Ion charge (of the dominant ionisation state; lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: imp_flag
field.documentation: Multiple charge state calculation flag : 0-Only one charge state is considered; 1-Multiple charge state are considered and are described in impurity CPO; Vector (nion)

field.name: label
field.documentation: Label for the ions - note the charge state is not included; String Vector (nion)

field.name: compositions
field.documentation: Contains detailed information on the plasma composition (main ions, impurities, neutrals, edge species).

field.name: nuclei
field.documentation: Array of nuclei considered.

field.name: zn
field.documentation: Nuclear charge [units of elementary charge];

field.name: amn
field.documentation: Mass of atom [amu]

field.name: label
field.documentation: String identifying element (e.g. H, D, T, He, C, ...)

field.name: ions
field.documentation: Array of main plasma ions.

field.name: nucindex
field.documentation: Index into list of nuclei; int

field.name: zion
field.documentation: Ion charge (of the dominant ionisation state; lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: imp_flag
field.documentation: Multiple charge state calculation flag : 0-Only one charge state is considered; 1-Multiple charge state are considered and are described in impurity CPO; Vector (nion)

field.name: label
field.documentation: String identifying ion (e.g. H+, D+, T+, He+2, C+, ...)

field.name: impurities
field.documentation: Array of impurities.

field.name: nucindex
field.documentation: Index into list of nuclei; int

field.name: i_ion
field.documentation: Index of the impurity species in the coreprof ion species ordering. Vector (nimp)

field.name: nzimp
field.documentation: Number of charge states (or bundles) considered for this impurity species.

field.name: zmin
field.documentation: Minimum Z of impurity ionisation state bundle. Vector (nzimp)

field.name: zmax
field.documentation: Maximum Z of impurity ionisation state bundle. If no bundle, zmax=zmin. Vector (nzimp)

field.name: label
field.documentation: String array (nzimp) identifying impurities (e.g. C+, C+2 , C+3, C+4, C+5, C+6, ...)

field.name: neutralscomp
field.documentation: Array of neutrals.

field.name: neutcomp
field.documentation: Array of components to the atom or molecule. Vector (ncomp)

field.name: nucindex
field.documentation: Index into list of nuclei; int

field.name: multiplicity
field.documentation: Multiplicity of the atom; int

field.name: type
field.documentation: Type of neutral, in terms of energy : 0=cold, 1=thermal, 2= fast, 3=NBI. Vector (ntype) of identifiers

field.name: id
field.documentation: Short string identifier

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Integer identifier

field.name: description
field.documentation: Verbose description of identifier

field.name: label
field.documentation: String identifying the atom or molecule (e.g. D2, DT, CD4, ...)

field.name: edgespecies
field.documentation: Array of edge species.

field.name: nucindex
field.documentation: Index into list of nuclei; int

field.name: zmin
field.documentation: Minimum Z of species charge state bundle

field.name: zmax
field.documentation: Maximum Z of species charge state bundle

field.name: label
field.documentation: String identifying the species (e.g. D0, D+, C0, C+, C+2, ...)

field.name: signature
field.documentation: Identifier for species choices. The goal of this is to uniquely capture the species blocks so that if the signatures are the same then the species blocks will also be the same.

field.name: id
field.documentation: Short string identifier

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Integer identifier

field.name: description
field.documentation: Verbose description of identifier

field.name: global_param
field.documentation: Global wave deposition parameters

field.name: frequency
field.documentation: Wave frequency [Hz]; Time-dependent, floating

field.name: name
field.documentation: Antenna name, String

field.name: type
field.documentation: Wave type (LH, EC, IC, ...), String

field.name: ntor
field.documentation: Toroidal mode numbers; Time-dependent; Vector (ntor)

field.name: f_assumption
field.documentation: Assumption on the functions distribution used by the wave solver to calculate the power deposition : 0 = Maxwellian (linear absorption); 1 = quasi-linear (F given by a distribution function CPO). Integer vector (nion+1). The first value corresponds to the electrons, then to the other ion species. Time-dependent.

field.name: power_tot
field.documentation: Total absorbed wave power [W]; Time-dependent

field.name: p_frac_ntor
field.documentation: Fraction of wave power per toroidal mode number; Time-dependent; Vector (ntor)

field.name: pow_i
field.documentation: Wave power absorbed by an ion species [W]; Time-dependent; Vector (nion)

field.name: pow_e
field.documentation: Wave power absorbed by the electrons [W]; Time-dependent; Float

field.name: pow_ntor_i
field.documentation: Wave power absorbed by an ion species per toroidal mode number [W]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ntor,nion)

field.name: pow_ntor_e
field.documentation: Wave power absorbed by the electrons per toroidal mode number [W]; Time-dependent; Vector (ntor)

field.name: cur_tor
field.documentation: Wave driven toroidal current from a stand alone calculation (not consistent with other sources) [A]; Time-dependent, Float

field.name: cur_tor_ntor
field.documentation: Wave driven toroidal current for each toroidal mode number from a stand alone calculation (not consistent with other sources) [A]; Time-dependent; Vector (ntor)

field.name: code_type
field.documentation: Type of wave deposition code for a given frequency: 1=beam/ray tracing; 2=full wave; Integer

field.name: toroid_field
field.documentation: Characteristics of the vacuum toroidal field, redundant with the toroidfield CPO, to document the normalisation of parallel current densities in this CPO; Float.

field.name: r0
field.documentation: Characteristic major radius of the device (used in publications, usually middle of the vessel at the equatorial midplane) [m]. Scalar.

field.name: b0
field.documentation: Vacuum field at r0 [T]; Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewed from above. Scalar. Time-dependent.

field.name: grid_1d
field.documentation: Grid points for 1D profiles.

field.name: rho_tor_norm
field.documentation: Normalised toroidal flux coordinate at the grid points for 1D profiles; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: rho_tor
field.documentation: Toroidal flux coordinate at the grid points for 1D profiles [m]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: psi
field.documentation: Grid points in poloidal flux function [Wb], without 1/2pi and such that Bp=|grad psi| /R/2/pi. Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: grid_2d
field.documentation: Grid points for 2D profiles and for full wave solutions.

field.name: grid_type
field.documentation: Grid type. 1: rectangular grid in (R,Z). 2: rectangular grid in (psi, theta). 3: unstructured grid. Integer.

field.name: rho_tor_norm
field.documentation: Normalised toroidal flux coordinate at the grid points for the 2D profiles; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: rho_tor
field.documentation: Toroidal flux coordinate at the grid points for the 2D profiles [m]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: psi
field.documentation: Grid points in poloidal flux function [Wb], without 1/2pi and such that Bp=|grad psi| /R/2/pi. Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: theta
field.documentation: Poloidal angle at the grid points (see theta_info for detailed definition); Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: r
field.documentation: R (major radius) of grid points; Time-dependent; Matrix(ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: z
field.documentation: Z (altitude) of grid points; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: theta_info
field.documentation: Information on the poloidal angle theta.

field.name: angl_type
field.documentation: Type of poloidal angle: 1 : same as the poloidal angle in the equlibrium cpo; 2 : geometrical polar angle, tan(theta) = Z/(R-R_0); 3 : other. If option 3, a transformation to the geometrical poloidal angle is provided in th2th_pol.

field.name: th2th_pol
field.documentation: Geometrical poloidal angle at grid points in theta, i.e. the transformation from theta to the polar poloidal angle; used only if angl_type=3; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: profiles_1d
field.documentation: 1D radial profiles

field.name: powd_tot
field.documentation: Total flux surface averaged wave power density [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: powd_e
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged absorbed wave power density on electrons [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: powd_i
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged absorbed wave power density on ion species [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, nion)

field.name: powd_ntor
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged power density for each toroidal mode number [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Matrix(npsi, ntor)

field.name: powd_ntor_e
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged absorbed power density for each toroidal mode number on electrons [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, ntor)

field.name: powd_ntor_i
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged power density for each toroidal mode number on each ions species [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Array3D (npsi, ntor, nion)

field.name: curd_tor
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged wave driven toroidal current density = average(jphi/R) / average(1/R) [A/m^2]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: curd_torntor
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged wave driven toroidal current density for each toroidal mode number = average(jphi/R) / average(1/R) [A/m^2]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, ntor)

field.name: pow_tot
field.documentation: Volume integrated absorbed wave power density [W]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: pow_e
field.documentation: Volume integrated absorbed wave power density on electrons [W]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: pow_i
field.documentation: Volume integrated absorbed wave power density on ion species [W]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, nion)

field.name: pow_ntor
field.documentation: Volume integrated power density for each toroidal mode number [W]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, ntor)

field.name: pow_ntor_e
field.documentation: Volume integrated power density for each toroidal mode number on the electrons [W]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, ntor)

field.name: pow_ntor_i
field.documentation: Volume integrated power density for each toroidal mode number on each ions species [W]; Time-dependent; Array3D (npsi, ntor, nion)

field.name: curd_par
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged wave driven parallel current density = average(j.B) / B0, where B0 is in global_param/toroid_field/b0, from stand alone calculation (not consistent with other sources) ; [A/m^2]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: curd_parntor
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged wave driven parallel current density for each toroidal mode number = average(j.B) / B0, where B0 is in global_param/toroid_field/b0, from stand alone calculation (not consistent with other sources) ; [A/m^2]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, ntor)

field.name: cur_tor
field.documentation: Wave driven toroidal current inside a flux surface from stand alone calculation (not consistent with other sources) [A]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: cur_tor_ntor
field.documentation: Wave driven toroidal current inside a flux surface for each toroidal mode number from a stand alone calculation (not consistent with other sources) [A]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, ntor)

field.name: profiles_2d
field.documentation: 2D profiles in poloidal cross-section

field.name: powd_tot
field.documentation: Total wave power density; Time-dependent [W/m^3]; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: powd_e
field.documentation: Absorbed wave power density on electrons [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: powd_i
field.documentation: Absorbed wave power density on ion species [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Array3D (ndim1, ndim2, nion)

field.name: powd_ntor
field.documentation: Absorbed power density for each toroidal mode number [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ndim1, ndim2, ntor)

field.name: powd_ntor_e
field.documentation: Absorbed power density for each toroidal mode number on electrons [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ndim1, ndim2, ntor)

field.name: powd_ntor_i
field.documentation: Absorbed power density for each toroidal mode number on each ions species [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Array4D (ndim1, ndim2, ntor, nion)

field.name: powd_iharm
field.documentation: Power density absorbed by an ion species for each toroidal mode numer at a given harmonic cyclotron resonance ; Time-dependent (W/m^3); Array5D (ndim1, ndim2, ntor, nion, nharm)

field.name: beamtracing
field.documentation: Beam-tracing or ray-tracing solver. Vector(nbeams). Time-dependent

field.name: npoints
field.documentation: Number of points along each ray/beam. Integer

field.name: power
field.documentation: Initial power in each ray/beam [W]. Float. Time-dependent

field.name: dnpar
field.documentation: Spectral width in refractive index associated with each ray/beam, Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: length
field.documentation: Ray/beam curvilinear length [m], Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: position
field.documentation: Ray/beam position

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius location [m]; Time-dependent; Vector (npoints)

field.name: z
field.documentation: Vertical location [m]; Time-dependent; Vector (npoints)

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle location [rad]; Time-dependent; Vector (npoints)

field.name: psi
field.documentation: Poloidal magnetic flux coordinate [Wb], without 1/2pi and such that Bp=|grad psi| /R/2/pi; Time-dependent; Vector (npoints)

field.name: theta
field.documentation: Poloidal angle location [rad]; Time-dependent; Vector (npoints). PRECISE THE DEFINITION OF THE POLOIDAL ANGLE, SEE WAVES/COHERENTWAVE(:)/GRID_2D.

field.name: wavevector
field.documentation: Ray/beam wave vector.

field.name: kr
field.documentation: Wave vector in the major radius direction [m**-1], Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: kz
field.documentation: Wave vector in the vertical direction [m**-1], Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: kphi
field.documentation: Wave vector in the toroidal direction [m**-1], Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: npar
field.documentation: Parallel refractive index, Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: nperp
field.documentation: Perpendicular refractive index, Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: ntor
field.documentation: Toroidal wave number, Vector (npoints/1). If var_ntor=0, ntor is constant along the ray path and the last dimension is of size 1 in order to avoid useless repetition of ntor constant value. Time-dependent

field.name: var_ntor
field.documentation: Flag telling whether ntor is constant along the ray path (0) or varying (1). Integer

field.name: polarization
field.documentation: Wave field polarization along the ray/beam.

field.name: epol_p_re
field.documentation: Real part of the left hand polarized electric field (rotating with the ions), Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: epol_p_im
field.documentation: Imaginary part of the left hand polarized electric field (rotating with the ions), Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: epol_m_re
field.documentation: Real part of the right hand polarized electric field (rotating with the electrons), Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: epol_m_im
field.documentation: Real part of the right hand polarized electric field (rotating with the electrons), Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: epol_par_re
field.documentation: Real part of the electric field polarization vector in the magnetic field direction, Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: epol_par_im
field.documentation: Imaginary part of the electric field polarization vector in the magnetic field direction, Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: powerflow
field.documentation: Power flow along the ray/beam.

field.name: phi_perp
field.documentation: Normalized power flow in the direction perpendicular to the magnetic field; Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: phi_par
field.documentation: Normalized power flow in the direction parallel to the magnetic field; Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: power_e
field.documentation: Power absorbed along the beam by electrons [W]; Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: power_i
field.documentation: Power absorbed along the beam by an ion species [W]; Matrix (npoints, nion). Time-dependent

field.name: fullwave
field.documentation: Solution by full wave code

field.name: grid
field.documentation: Grid for storing the components of the wave field; Time-dependent

field.name: uid
field.documentation: Unique index of this grid. Used for handling multiple grids

field.name: id
field.documentation: Name / identifier string for this grid

field.name: spaces
field.documentation: Definitions of grid spaces. Array of structures (number of spaces)

field.name: geotype
field.documentation: Type of space geometry (id flags). Flags defining how the geometry (objects.geo) fields associated with; space objects are to be interpreted. Array (number of geometries defined for this space),; first dimension: geometry index. A flag value of GRID_UNDEFINED=0 indicates the standard interpretation for; the given coordinates.

field.name: geotypeid
field.documentation: Type of space geometries (id string). See geotype.

field.name: coordtype
field.documentation: Type of coordinates describing the physical space. Vector (number of space dimensions); The size of coordtype defines the dimension of the space.; For predefined integer constants for standard coordinates see; the documentation of the grid service library.

field.name: objects
field.documentation: Definition of the space objects.; Array of structures (dimension of highest-dimensional objects).; First dimension: dimension of the objects (1=nodes, 2=edges, 3=faces, 4=cells/volumes, ...)

field.name: boundary
field.documentation: Lists of (n-1)-dimensional space objects defining the boundary of an n-dimensional space object.; Matrix(number of objects of dimension n, maximum number of boundary objects).; First dimension: object index, second dimension: boundary object index

field.name: neighbour
field.documentation: Connectivity information. Array (number of objects, maximum number of boundaries per object, maximum number of neighbours per boundary).; Stores the indices of the n-dimensional objects adjacent to the given n-dimensional object.;An object can possibly have multiple neighbours on every boundary.; First dimension: object index, second dimension: boundary index, third dimension: neighbour index on the boundary.

field.name: geo
field.documentation: Geometry data matrix associated with every object. Float array (number of objects, number of geometry coeff. 1, number of geometry coeff. 2, number of geometries).; The exact definition depends on the geometry type of the space (complexgrid_space.geotype).; First dimension: object index, second+third dimension: geometry coefficient matrix row+column, third dimension: geometry index (for definition of multiple geometries).

field.name: measure
field.documentation: Measure of space objects, i.e. physical size (length for 1d, area for 2d, volume for 3d objects,...). [m^dim].; First dimension: object index, second dimension: geometry index

field.name: xpoints
field.documentation: List of indices of all nodes which are x-points. Vector (number of x-points)

field.name: subgrids
field.documentation: Definitions of subgrids. Array of structures (number of subgrids)

field.name: id
field.documentation: ID string (name) of the subgrid.

field.name: list
field.documentation: List of object lists. Array of structures (number of object lists).

field.name: cls
field.documentation: Class tuple of the grid objects in this object list. Vector (number of grid spaces)

field.name: indset
field.documentation: Implicit list of the object indices.; Array of structures (number of grid spaces = length of index tuple). Every index of the index tuple is described by an index set, which defines either a list of index values or a range of index values.

field.name: range
field.documentation: Defines an index range enumerating from range[1] to range[2] (with both range[1] and range[2] included). If additionally a third value range(3) is given, it is used as a stride. If it is omitted, a stride of 1 is assumed. Vector(3)

field.name: ind
field.documentation: An explicit list of indices. If this member is defined and has nonzero size, the list is assumed to be explicit. Vector(length of explicit index list)

field.name: ind
field.documentation: Explicit list of index tuples. Matrix (number of objects, number of spaces in grid).; First dimension: object index, second dimension: index tuple/space index.; If this field is defined and has nonzero size, the object list is understood to be explicit.

field.name: metric
field.documentation: Metric coefficients

field.name: measure
field.documentation: Measure of object, i.e. physical size (length for 1d, area for 2d, volume for 3d objects). [m^dim].; Use this field to store measures of implicitly defined grid objects.; Array of structures (number of subgrids this information is stored on)

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this scalar quantity is associated with.

field.name: subgrid
field.documentation: Index of the subgrid (as stored in grid.subgrids) the data is stored on.

field.name: scalar
field.documentation: Scalar representation of data. One scalar entry is stored per object in the subgrid.; The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float Vector(nobjects_subgrid). First dimension: object index.

field.name: vector
field.documentation: Vector representation of data. One vector is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float matrix(nobjects_subgrid, ndata).First dimension: object index, second dimension: index of data vector.

field.name: matrix
field.documentation: Matrix representation of data. One matrix is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; 3d float array(nobjects_subgrid,ndata1,ndata2). First dimension: object index, second dimension: matrix row, third dimension: matrix column.

field.name: g11
field.documentation: Metric coefficients g11. Array of structures (number of subgrids this information is stored on)

field.name: geo
field.documentation: Geometry data for implicit objects

field.name: geotype
field.documentation: Type of geometry (id flag). A flag defining how the geometry data associated with grid objects is to be interpreted. If the field is undefined (0=GRID_UNDEFINED), the standard interpretation for; the given coordinate types is assumed.

field.name: geotypeid
field.documentation: Type of geometry (id string).

field.name: coordtype
field.documentation: Type of coordinates describing the physical space. Vector (number of space dimensions); The size of coordtype defines the dimension of the space.; For predefined integer constants for standard coordinates see; the documentation of the grid service library.

field.name: geo_matrix
field.documentation: Geometry data matrix associated with implicit objects. Array of structures (number of subgrids this information is stored on); The exact definition of the stored values depends on the geometry type of the geometry complexgrid_geo_global.geotype;

field.name: griduid

field.name: subgrid
field.documentation: Index of the subgrid (as stored in grid.subgrids) the data is stored on.

field.documentation: Components of the vector. Array of structures (number of vector components). Time-dependent; FIXME: inherit time-dependence for this element

field.name: alignid
field.documentation: Alignment id for vector components. String vector (number of vector components).

field.name: basis

field.name: output_flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values meaning some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used. Exact rules could discussed and implemented in the module wrapper. Time-dependent.
